info.author: Floyd Hightower
info.description: # Democritus File System (Files and Directories) [![PyPI](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/democritus-file-system.svg)](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/democritus-file-system) [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.com/democritus-project/democritus-file-system.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.com/democritus-project/democritus-file-system) [![codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/democritus-project/democritus-file-system/branch/master/graph/badge.svg?token=V0WOIXRGMM)](https://codecov.io/gh/democritus-project/democritus-file-system) Democritus functions[1] for working with files and directories. [1] Democritus functions are simple, effective, modular, well-tested, and well-documented Python functions. ## Usage Coming soon... ## Credits This package was created with [Cookiecutter](https://github.com/audreyr/cookiecutter) and Floyd Hightower's [Python project template](https://github.com/fhightower-templates/python-project-template).
info.name: democritus-file-system
info.summary: Democritus functions for working with files and directories.

vulnerabilities.details: The d8s-json package for Python, as distributed on PyPI, included a potential code-execution backdoor inserted by a third party. The backdoor is the democritus-file-system package. The affected version is 0.1.0.

The d8s-yaml package for Python, as distributed on PyPI, included a potential code-execution backdoor inserted by a third party. The backdoor is the democritus-file-system package. The affected version is 0.1.0.

The d8s-archives package for Python, as distributed on PyPI, included a potential code-execution backdoor inserted by a third party. The backdoor is the democritus-file-system package. The affected version is 0.1.0.

The d8s-utility package for Python, as distributed on PyPI, included a potential code-execution backdoor inserted by a third party. The backdoor is the democritus-file-system package. The affected version is 0.1.0.
